section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 29, 2023.*
section.heading: Relationship to other services.
section.text: Services and supports provided under this chapter shall not be considered Continuum of Care services under the Homeless Services Reform Act of 2005, effective October 22, 2005 (D.C. Law 16-35; D.C, Official Code § 4-751.01 et seq.).
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 4-773.03, see § 103 of Migrant Services and Supports Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-193, July 27, 2023, 70 DCR 10729).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 103 of Migrant Services and Supports Extension Emergency Amendment Act of 2023 (D.C. Act 25-193, July 27, 2023, 70 DCR 10729).
